articles.title: India's data centre industry's capacity to double by 2024, says Jones Lang LaSalle - Moneycontrol
articles.description: India’s Data Centre industry is expected to add 681 megawatt of capacity by the end of 2024, doubling capacity to 1,318 MW. The industry will need 7.8 million sq. ft of real estate to achieve the target.
